mapper.insert: insert into attach ( fullName, bno, fileSize ) values ( #{fullName}, (SELECT MAX(bno) from board), #{fileSize} )
mapper.select:
select rownum as rn, b1.* from ( SELECT A1.* FROM ( SELECT rownum, bno, title, user_name, (select to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh12:mi:ss') from board where bno=b.bno) regdate, viewcnt, (select count(*) from reply where bno=b.bno) cnt FROM board b, admin a
order by bno desc)A1
union
SELECT A2.* FROM ( SELECT rownum, bno, title, user_name, (select to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh12:mi:ss') from board where bno=b.bno) regdate, viewcnt, (select count(*) from reply where bno=b.bno) cnt FROM board b, member m
order by bno desc)A2 )b1
order by bno desc

select sum(C.cnt) from (select count(*) cnt from board b, admin a
union all select count(*) cnt from board b, member m ) C
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno,title,(select to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh12:mi:ss') from board where bno=b.bno) regdate,content,viewcnt,user_name,writer from board b, member m where b.writer=m.userid and b.bno=#{bno} union all select bno,title,(select to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh12:mi:ss') from board where bno=b.bno) regdate,content,viewcnt,user_name,writer from board b, admin a where b.writer=a.userid and b.bno=#{bno}
